title: LOQI AR.SW.PS Artists Psychedelic Bag by Steven Wilson
features: Each LOQI bag comes with an extra zip pocket and an inner pocket
How to use me? Fold me into my zip pocket, roll me up with my strap or stuff me into the inside pocket
Holds up to 20 kg (44 pounds) – a great alternative for plastic shopping bags
Bag dimensions 50 x 42 cm (19.7" x 16.5”), zip pocket 11 x 11.5 cm (4.5” x 4.5”), inside pocket 13.5
Material 100% polyester, water resistant, food safe, OEKO-TEX certified free from harmful substances
description: Strong like a man, loyal like a dog. LOQI bags are super-strong, chemical-free, long-lasting, water-resistant and washable. And they're extremely good looking. No, it’s not too much to ask. You can have your cake and eat it too. Weight 55 g (1.94 ounce) bag dimensions 50 x 42 cm (19.7" x 16.5") inside pocket 13.5 x 16 cm (5.3” x 6.3”) zip pocket 11 x 11.5 cm (4.5” x 4.5") handle 27 cm (10.6") holds 20 kg (44 lbs.) material 100% polyester LOQI makes extra-loveable, super-strong bags, backpacks, zip pockets and luggage covers. Our products are also just like you and me - great looking, smart and dependable.
